Background

I grew up in Dominican Republic and just graduated from Boston College after four years of Marketing, Finance and Political Science.

I'm highly motivated to bring about meaningful change in everything I do. I look forward to joining a hot startup sometime soon and working with a passionate team of visionary individuals. I love traveling, languages, innovation, and music.

You can find me at the Harvard Innovation Lab and at growthninja.com

Michael will change the world very soon.
